Temperature Color Scale

Zone 3: -40 to -30°F (Coldest)
Zone 4-5: -30 to -10°F
Zone 6-7: -10 to 10°F
Zone 8-9: 10 to 30°F
Zone 10-12: 30 to 60°F (Warmest)
Blue = Coldest zones | Red = Warmest zones
